settings.home_page_richtext:
You may be asked to supply information relevant to your Purchase if you wish to purchase any product or service made available through the Service (“Purchase”). This may include, without limitation, your credit card number, the expiration date of your credit card, your billing address, and your shipping information. By providing this information, you represent and warrant: (i) you have the legal right to use any credit card(s) or other payment method(s) in connection with any Purchase; and that (ii) the information you supply to us is true, correct and complete.

The Service may employ the use of third-party services for the purpose of facilitating payment and the completion of Purchases. You grant us the right to provide the aforementioned information to these third-parties, subject to our Privacy Policy, by submitting your information.

We reserve the right to refuse or cancel your order at any time for reasons including but not limited to: product or service availability, errors in the description or price of the product or service, error in your order, or any other reason. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel your order if fraud or an unauthorized or illegal transaction is suspected.

While all our packages are guaranteed against defects, our 30-day money-back guarantee only applies to your first order.

If you feel our products are not for you, email us at support@levelfoods.com within 30 days of receiving your order. You will have the option to send your order back to us using the provided instructions or we can provide a prepaid return shipping label in which its cost is deducted from your return credit. Seal up the box with leftover products inside and use the provided return label to ship it out within 14 days of initiating the return. After we receive your package (usually within 7-10 business days), we’ll issue the refund and send you an email confirmation.

*Please note, any shipping fees paid at the time the order was placed are not refundable.

Package forwarding: We currently only ship within the United States. While we appreciate international customers who are excited enough about Level to use a package forwarding service, those orders are unfortunately not covered by our 30-day money-back guarantee.

Expedited shipping: Expedited shipping fees are not refundable. If your package did not arrive within the specified time frame, let us know so that we can file a report with the carrier.

It happens very infrequently, but if we send you the wrong product or product that is within 60 days of the printed best by date, please let us know within 30 days of receiving your order and we’ll send you a replacement.

settings.title_block: SMS/MMS Mobile Message Marketing Program Terms and Conditions
settings.home_page_richtext:
We offer a mobile messaging program (the “Mobile Program”),   By opting in to or participating in any of our programs, including the Mobile Program, you accept and agree our Terms and Conditions.

User Opt In: The Mobile Program allows participants to receive SMS/MMS mobile messages by affirmatively opting into the Mobile Program, such as through online or application-based enrollment forms. Regardless of the opt-in method you utilized to join the Mobile Program, you agree that this Agreement applies to your participation in the Mobile Program.  By participating in the Mobile Program, you agree to receive autodialed or prerecorded marketing mobile messages at the phone number associated with your opt-in, and you understand that consent is not required to make any purchase from us.  While you consent to receive messages sent using an autodialer, these Terms and Conditions will not be interpreted to suggest or imply that any or all of Our mobile messages are sent using an automatic telephone dialing system (“ATDS” or “autodialer”).  Message and data rates may apply.  

User Opt Out:  If you do not wish to continue participating in the Mobile Program or no longer agree to this Agreement, you agree to reply STOP, END, CANCEL, UNSUBSCRIBE, or QUIT to any mobile message from Us in order to opt out of the Program.  You may receive an additional mobile message confirming your decision to opt out. You understand and agree that the foregoing options are the only reasonable methods of opting out.  You also understand and agree that any other method of opting out, including, but not limited to, texting words other than those set forth above or verbally requesting one of our employees to remove you from our list, is not a reasonable means of opting out. Necessary steps concerning exercising rights you might have under the GDPR or CCPA are provided in the Privacy Policy.

Duty to Notify and Indemnification:  If at any time you intend to stop using the mobile telephone number that has been used to subscribe to the Mobile Program, including canceling your service plan or selling or transferring the phone number to another party, you agree that you will complete the User Opt Out process set forth above prior to ending your use of the mobile telephone number.  You understand and agree that your agreement to do so is a material part of these terms and conditions.  You further agree that, if you discontinue the use of your mobile telephone number without notifying us of such change, you agree that you will be responsible for all costs (including attorneys’ fees) and liabilities incurred by us, or any party that assists in the delivery of the mobile messages, as a result of claims brought by individual(s) who are later assigned that mobile telephone number.  This duty and agreement shall survive any cancellation or termination of your agreement to participate in our Services, including the Mobile Program.

AMONG OTHER DUTIES AS SET FORTH IN THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AND THE PRIVACY POLICY, YOU AGREE THAT YOU SHALL INDEMNIFY, DEFEND, AND HOLD US HARMLESS FROM ANY CLAIM OR LIABILITY RESULTING FROM YOUR FAILURE TO NOTIFY US OF A CHANGE IN THE INFORMATION YOU HAVE PROVIDED, INCLUDING ANY CLAIM OR LIABILITY UNDER THE TELEPHONE CONSUMER PROTECTION ACT, 47 U.S.C. § 227, et seq., OR SIMILAR STATE AND FEDERAL LAWS, AND ANY REGULATIONS PROMULGATED THEREUNDER RESULTING FROM US ATTEMPTING TO CONTACT YOU AT THE MOBILE TELEPHONE NUMBER YOU PROVIDED.

Nothing under the heading “Duty to Notify and Indemnification” restricts or limits your duties to indemnify us or restricts our limits our rights under the Terms and Conditions or Privacy Policy.

Mobile Program Description: Without limiting the scope of the Mobile Program, users that opt into the Mobile Program can expect to receive messages concerning the marketing and sale of digital and physical products, services, and events. Your election to not opt in to the Mobile Program will not prevent you from asking for and receiving any financial incentives provided through the Mobile Program.

Cost and Frequency: Message and data rates may apply. The Program involves recurring mobile messages, and additional mobile messages may be sent periodically based on your interaction with Us.

Support Instructions: For support regarding the Program, text “HELP” to the number you received messages from or email us at contact@levelfoods.com.  Please note that the use of this email address is not an acceptable method of opting out of the program. Opt outs must be submitted in accordance with the procedures set forth above.

MMS Disclosure: The Program will send SMS TMs (terminating messages) if your mobile device does not support MMS messaging.

Our Disclaimer of Warranty: The Program is offered on an "as-is" basis and may not be available in all areas at all times and may not continue to work in the event of product, software, coverage or other changes made by your wireless carrier. We will not be liable for any delays or failures in the receipt of any mobile messages connected with this Program. Delivery of mobile messages is subject to effective transmission from your wireless service provider/network operator and is outside of Our control. T-Mobile is not liable for delayed or undelivered mobile messages.

Participant Requirements:  You must have a wireless device of your own, capable of two-way messaging, be using a participating wireless carrier, and be a wireless service subscriber with text messaging service. Not all cellular phone providers carry the necessary service to participate. Check your phone capabilities for specific text messaging instructions.

Age Restriction:  You must be comply with age restrictions of the Terms and Conditions to participate in the Mobile Program and in all events, must be at least eighteen years of age to participate in the Mobile Program.

By purchasing a Monthly Subscription, you agree to both an initial and recurring Monthly Subscription for products at the then-current Monthly Subscription rate. You accept responsibility for all recurring charges until you cancel your subscription. You can cancel your subscription at any time. In the event you cancel your subscription, you will not be refunded any amount, pro-rata or otherwise. However, you will not incur any additional charges.

Automatic Monthly Renewal Terms: We will automatically process your payments, and will charge your credit card, for the then current Monthly Subscription rate, until you cancel your subscription. We explain how to cancel your subscription below.

settings.title_block: Dispute resolution, informal efforts, arbitration, and class actions
settings.home_page_richtext:

Accordingly, prior to seeking any relief from any outside source, you agree to contact it, as provided below, and provide it with no less than thirty-days to resolve the dispute. In the event its efforts are unsatisfactory to you, then you must first send it a written notice of dispute, by certified mail, to 7023 McEwan Rd Lake Oswego OR 97035. Your written notice of dispute must include a description of the nature and basis of your claim or dispute and set forth the specific relief you seek. If you and ME Bar, LLC are unable to resolve the claim within sixty calendar days after ME Bar, LLC receives the notice, you or ME Bar, LLC may commence an arbitration proceeding. During the arbitration, the amount of any settlement offer made by ME Bar, LLC will not be disclosed to the arbitrator until after the arbitrator determines the amount, if any, to which you or ME Bar, LLC is entitled.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, you agree that any and all disputes or claims that have arisen or may arise between you and ME Bar, LLC, whether arising out of or relating to this Terms and Conditions (including any alleged breach thereof), the Privacy Policy, the Services, any advertising, any aspect of the relationship or transactions between us, will be resolved exclusively through final and binding arbitration to the exclusion of any other dispute resolution entity or process. However, neither ME Bar, LLC nor this provision preclude you from bringing issues to the attention of federal, state, or local agencies, and such agencies can, if the law allows, seek relief against ME Bar, LLC on your behalf. You agree that, by entering into these Terms and Conditions, you are waiving any right to a trial by jury or to participate in a class action. Your rights will be determined by a neutral arbitrator, not a judge or jury. The Federal Arbitration Act governs the interpretation and enforcement of this agreement to arbitrate disputes. Arbitration will be conducted under the American Arbitration Association’s rules and procedures, as modified by these Terms.

You agree and understand that you may only bring a claim against ME Bar, LLC on an individual basis. You are not able to bring a claim against ME Bar, LLC as a plaintiff or class member in any purported class or representative action or proceeding. Unless ME Bar, LLC agrees in writing, no arbitrator may preside over any form of a consolidated proceeding. settings.home_page_richtext:
Service
Service is the www.levelfoods.com website operated by ME Bar, LLC or the Mobile Program (defined below).
settings.home_page_richtext_one:
Personal Data
Personal Data is data about an individual who can be identified from those data or inferred from review of the data (or from those and other information either in our possession or likely to come into our possession).
settings.home_page_richtext_two:
Usage Data
Usage Data is data collected automatically and is either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
settings.home_page_richtext_three:
Cookies
Cookies are small files stored on your device, whether a computer, mobile device, or other internet connected device.
settings.home_page_richtext_four:
Data Controller
Data Controller means the natural or legal person who (either alone or jointly or in common with other persons) determines the purposes for which and the manner in which any personal information are, or are to be, processed. For the purpose of this Privacy Policy, ME Bar, LLC is a Data Controller of your Personal Data.
settings.home_page_richtext_five:
Data Processors (or Service Providers)
Data Processor (or Service Provider) means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Data Controller. ME Bar, LLC may use the services of various Service Providers in order to process your data more effectively.
settings.home_page_richtext_six:
Data Subject (or User)
Data Subject is any living individual who is using ME Bar, LLC’s Service and is the subject of Personal Data.

settings.home_page_richtext_block: ME Bar, LLC collects several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve the Service to you.

settings.home_page_richtext:
Personal Data
While using the Service, ME Bar, LLC may ask you to provide it with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you (“Personal Data”). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

Email address;
First name and last name;

You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from it by following the unsubscribe link or instructions provided in any email ME Bar, LLC sends or by contacting it.
settings.home_page_richtext_one:
Tracking Cookies Data
ME Bar, LLC uses cookies and other tracking technologies to track the activity on its Service and ME Bar, LLC holds certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Other tracking technologies are also used such as beacons, tags and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze the Service.

You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of the Service.

Examples of Cookies ME Bar, LLC uses or may use:

Session Cookies. Session Cookies to operate its Service.
Preference Cookies. Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.

This Usage Data may include information such as your computer’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of the Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
settings.home_page_richtext_three:
Location Data
ME Bar, LLC may use and store information about your location  (“Location Data”). ME Bar, LLC uses this data to provide features of the Service, to improve and customize the Service. You may enable or disable location services when you use the Service at any time through your device settings.

settings.text_title_block: Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
settings.home_page_richtext_block:
If you are from the European Economic Area (EEA), ME Bar, LLC’s legal basis for collecting and using the personal information described in this Privacy Policy depends on the Personal Data ME Bar, LLC collects and the specific context in which ME Bar, LLC collects it.

ME Bar, LLC may process your Personal Data because:

ME Bar, LLC needs to perform a contract with you;
You gave it permission to do so;
The processing of the Personal Data is in its legitimate interest and is not overridden by your rights; or
To comply with the law.

ME Bar, LLC will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. ME Bar, LLC will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with its legal obligations (for example, if ME Bar, LLC is required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes and enforce its legal agreements and policies.

ME Bar, LLC will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally, but not necessarily, retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of the Service, or ME Bar, LLC is legally obligated to retain this data for longer periods.

Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to – and maintained on – computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction. If you are located outside the United States and choose to provide information to ME Bar, LLC, please note that ME Bar, LLC transfers the data, including Personal Data, to the United States and processes it there. Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.

ME Bar, LLC will take all the steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information.
ME Bar, LLC is not in the business of selling your information. However, there are times we may share your Personal Data with others and without further notice to you.
Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.
ME Bar, LLC may buy or sell businesses or assets. In the event of a sale, merger, reorganization, dissolution, or similar event, Personal Data may be part of the assets ME Bar, LLC transfers.

ME Bar, LLC may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:

To comply with a legal obligation;
To protect and defend the rights or property of ME Bar, LLC;
To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service;
To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public; or
To protect against legal liability.

The security of your data is important to ME Bar, LLC but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or means of electronic storage is 100% secure. While ME Bar, LLC strives to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, ME Bar, LLC cannot guarantee its absolute security.

settings.text_title_block: ME Bar, LLC’s Policy on "Do Not Track" Signals under the California Online Protection Act (CalOPPA)
settings.home_page_richtext_block: ME Bar, LLC does not support Do Not Track (“DNT”). Do Not Track is a preference you can set in your web browser to inform websites that you do not want to be tracked. The preferences or settings page of your web browser should allow you to enable or disable Do Not Track.

settings.text_title_block: Your Data Protection Rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
settings.home_page_richtext_block:
Residents of the European Economic Area (EEA) have certain data protection rights. ME Bar, LLC aims to take reasonable steps allowing you to correct, amend, delete or limit the use of your Personal Data. If you wish to be informed about what Personal Data ME Bar, LLC holds about you and if you want it to be removed from its systems, please contact her.

In certain circumstances, you have the following data protection rights:

settings.home_page_richtext: The right to object. You have the right to object to the processing of your Personal Data.
settings.home_page_richtext_one: The right of restriction. You have the right to request that ME Bar, LLC restricts the processing of your personal information.
settings.home_page_richtext_two: The right to access, update or delete the information ME Bar, LLC has on you. Whenever made possible, i.e. if you have an account with such capability, you can access, update or request deletion of your Personal Data directly within your account settings section. If you are unable to perform these actions yourself, please contact ME Bar, LLC to assist you.
settings.home_page_richtext_three: The right of rectification. You have the right to have your information rectified if that information is inaccurate or incomplete.
settings.home_page_richtext_four: The right to data portability. You have the right to be provided with a copy of the information ME Bar, LLC has on you in a structured, machine-readable and commonly used format.
settings.home_page_richtext_five: The right to withdraw consent. You also have the right to withdraw your consent at any time where ME Bar, LLC relied on your consent to process your personal information.

settings.home_page_richtext_block: Please note that ME Bar, LLC may ask you to verify your identity before responding to such requests. You have the right to complain to a Data Protection Authority about its collection and use of your Personal Data. settings.subtitle: OUR
settings.title: STORY
settings.code:
In the Fall of 2016, I found myself baffled by my husband as he grew increasingly frustrated and tired. I wanted to heal him but didn’t know what to do. On the cusp of his fifth season in the NBA, Meyers was struggling to sleep, recover from training, and sustain any sort of energy. These symptoms weren’t just affecting him on the court. They were coming home too. Day after day, I kept seeing my 7’1” man standing far from tall.

That November, I connected Meyers with Dr. Philip Goglia, an elite nutritionist from Los Angeles. I’ll never forget our first phone call with him. With a look at Meyers' blood work, he quickly identified the cause of his energy and recovery issues. Meyers’ inflammatory markers were through the roof, and the foods he was eating were accentuating the problem. Immediately, Dr. Goglia put together a plan. Little did we know, these dietary changes would change our lives.

Two weeks later, Meyers walked into the kitchen looking substantially leaner. I worried that he was losing weight that he needed as an NBA center. To our surprise, he hopped on the scale and his weight was the same. His leaner figure was the result of less inflammation, not a loss of muscle. For the first time in what felt like forever, I saw a light at the end of the tunnel. And who would have thought it was as simple as eating the right foods?

Fast forward two years. Our lives, relationships, and his career were at a whole new level. Our heavy fog had lifted. But there was still one problem. During the chaotic basketball season, sticking to Meyers’ diet plan was proving difficult. Limited snack options at the gym and on the road left Meyers resorting back to foods that weren’t approved in his new diet. Knowing how far we had come, there was no way I would let us go back. So, I started presenting him with new bar options. You would think that in a category with an overwhelming number of choices, there would have been one option that met both his standards and mine. And yet, option after option fell short. So on January 6th, 2018, I decided to take matters into my own hands and got into the kitchen myself. One batch of bars became two, and two batches quickly turned to ten. Before I knew it, I couldn’t keep up with the demand.

settings.subtitle: We had something.
settings.title: And, we needed to share it.
settings.tex_block: The struggle that felt like a dead end road ended up revealing a whole new path. I am grateful, humbled, and inviting you along. From my home to your hands, I give you a whole new LEVEL. Because with all my heart, I believe that healthy shouldn’t be hard.

settings.question: QUESTION:  WHY DID COLLAGEN NEVER END UP GETTING MARRIED?
settings.answer: Answer: Because it had too many types.
settings.description: Collagen, the beauty protein, is a triple helix of amino acids used in the structure of organs and tissues. Despite its place as the body’s most abundant protein, natural collagen production decreases with age. Coming in clutch, hydrolyzed collagen products can replenish our stores to reduce bone breakdown, repair tissues, promote gut health, and combat age-related breakdown of skin and joints. Build me up, collagen buttercup.

settings.title: CHICORY ROOT
settings.question: QUESTION: WHAT IS THE PROPER WAY TO GREET A CHICORY ROOT?
settings.description: For all intents and purposes, chicory root is the gold medalist of inulin content. Inulin is a type of soluble fiber and prebiotic shown to improve overall gut health. As a prebiotic, inulin functions as the food fuel which allows probiotics to thrive and multiply. Chicory root is an impressive multitasker. Its inulin shows serious promise for weight maintenance, fat reduction, and decreased constipation. We’re “rooting” for you.

settings.question: QUESTION: WHY DID THE SCIENTIST CARRY AROUND HIS BOOK ABOUT MUSHROOMS?
settings.answer: Answer: He heard it was really Portabella
settings.description: Cordyceps have been touted in Chinese medicine for centuries for their healing properties, but have only recently been accepted among athletes as the “magic mushroom” for athletic performance. Research shows Cordyceps can fight fatigue and improve your game by helping to deliver more oxygen to your blood. Whether you’re a serious athlete or just looking for a boost to your daily burn, Cordyceps will turn you into the Energizer bunny. You’ll just keep going and going and going…

settings.title: In case you’re in need of some light reading
EGG WHITE
settings.question: QUESTION: WHAT DOES A MEDITATING EGG SAY?
settings.description: Low in fat, carbohydrates, and calories, this clear cushion for the yolk packs quite the protein punch. As a complete protein, egg whites naturally contain all nine essential amino acids. One of these amino acids, leucine is especially useful for both building skeletal muscle and preventing its breakdown. Virtually free of the controversial cholesterol and saturated fat found in egg yolk, this low-cal protein is free to moderate blood pressure, aid in weight loss or maintenance, and be eaten pre or post workout for increased muscle creation. Someone call Netflix. It looks like egg white is the new black.

settings.title: In case you’re in need of some light reading
LION'S MANE
settings.question: QUESTION: WHY DID THE FUNGI LEAVE THE PARTY?
settings.description: Lion’s Mane mushroom, also known as Hericium erinaceus, hou tou gu or yamabushitaki, is a large, whitish, and shaggy mushroom resembling—you guessed it—a Lion’s Mane. This mushroom has culinary and medical applications in some Asian countries, and boasts tons of brain power. Studies show lion’s mane promotes nerve growth, which could aid in the prevention of dementia, and supports memory, concentration, and all-around cognitive function. It’s the smarty-pants of mushrooms, keeping you focused and on-point throughout your day.

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.text:
Just before his fifth NBA season, Meyers was struggling to sleep, recover, and sustain energy. When we realized that what he ate directly influenced how he felt, we began to eliminate inflammatory foods from his diet.

We saw a huge improvement both physically and mentally for Meyers. It became difficult to maintain with his travel schedule. So, I began looking for protein bar options and soon realized that there weren’t any bars that met both his diet and taste requirements.

What began as a way for me to find a solution for the person that I love most, turned into something that I am honored to share with you.

settings.title_block: ME BAR, LLC’s Referral Program Terms & Conditions
settings.home_page_richtext:
These Referral Program Terms & Conditions (“Referral Terms”) apply to our Give $5 Get $5 referral program (“G5G5 Program”). These terms are incorporated into the Terms as defined at https://levelfoods.com/pages/terms-and-conditions , and you agree to be bound by the Terms, the Privacy Policy, and these Referral Terms by participating in the G5G5 Program . The definitions provided in the Terms apply to these Referral Terms.

By participating in the G5G5 Program, you are a “Referrer” under these Referral Terms.

Qualified Referral. A “Qualified Referral” is defined as a product purchase (i) made using the Service by a person who (a) resolves the domain www.levelfoods.com by clicking the unique G5G5 Program link (a "Referred Customer") we provide and (b) is a first-time purchaser of product; and (ii) thathas a total value of at least $20.00 (excluding taxes, discounts, shipping charges, returns, cancelled transactions, and any applicable third party fees); and (iii) is purchased in United States Dollars; and (iv) is purchased by a purchaser located in the United States for shipping to an address located in the United States. The Referrer’s unique referral link may not be shared, sold, or used in any way except by the Referrer alone to obtain Qualified Referrals; referral links shared to or obtained through other sources (such as through a posting to a third-party intermediary or website) will not be honored. Referrers are limited to one (1) Qualified Referral for each Referred Customer; in other words, additional/repeat purchases made by a Referred Customer are not counted as additional Qualified Referrals.

Referred Customer. The Referred Customer and the Referrer cannot be the same person (for example, by using a different email address), as determined in our sole discretion.

Referral Rewards. To earn referral rewards as a Referrer, the Referred Customer must complete an order greater than $20.00 in total value, minus allfees including taxes, discounts, shipping, returns, chargebacks, fraudulent payments, and/or other 3rd party fees. Referral Rewards can only be used for purchase of Products through the Service and are not redeemable for cash or gift cards. Referral Rewards may only be redeemed for purchases made in United States Dollars. Referral Rewards have no cash value.

Reward Payments. Rewards are payable in increments of $5.00. Referrers are responsible for all tax liability resulting from Referral Rewards.

Eligibility. Our G5G5 Program cannot be used by businesses or individuals for affiliate lead generation or posted on discount sites, as determined in our sole discretion. (Corporations are not people, my friend!)

No Combination. Referred Customers may not combine any discounts obtained through their use of the G5G5 Program with any other promotions we offer.

Compliance with Law. As a Referrer, you agree to comply with all applicable laws, including, but not limited to the CAN SPAM Act and Telephone Consumer Protection Act. Any distribution of your G5G5 Program link that could constitute unsolicited commercial email, "spam," or other improper or unauthorized communication under any applicable law or regulation is expressly prohibited and will be grounds for immediate termination of your account and exclusion from our G5G5 Program and our Services.

Right to Cancel Program or Change Terms. We reserve the right to cancel the G5G5 Program and to revise these Referral Terms from time to time. If theG5G5 Program is terminated, any unclaimed Referral Rewards will be forfeited at that time.

settings.description: A native plant of Peru, Maca grows in the Andes Mountains under extremely harsh conditions and at very high altitudes. Peruvians have been cultivating the Maca root for over 2,000 years for its medicinal properties. With adaptogenic and antioxidant benefits, Maca is a powerful superfood that supports your energy metabolism, stamina, and libido.

settings.testimonial_comment: It fueled me perfectly after my conditioning workout but I found myself wanting more because it was so good.

Protein bars have been a big part of my life - from pre workout, to post workout, and even mid-game as an athlete. Finding the right bar that makes you feel good and helps you push through your training is hard. Finding one that tastes good is even harder. Level somehow figured out how to do it all, and now I’m hooked.
I summited Mt St Helens on Thursday. I ate several mini level bars on the way up. Amazing fuel and perfect size. Here’s a photo of me taking a snack break with banana bread.

For me, LEVEL bars are a great in between snack to help me bridge the hunger gap between meals. I love having banana bread in the morning, oat cookie after lunch. Plus, the minis are super easy to just throw in your bag in case of a (hangry) emergency.

Level bars are the perfect consistency with wonderful subtle flavor. The flavor is not overwhelming and because of that I don’t think I could ever get tired of these flavors. If I HAD to choose a favorite, I am thinking the oat mostly because it doesn’t feel like a treat it just feels like a good snack or possible meal replacement in a time crunch

settings.title: Fast Food. Not Junk Food
settings.paragraph:
A 400kcal meal of Huel Powder contains a balanced macro split of 37:30:30:3 (carbohydrates, protein, fat, fiber) plus all the 27 essential vitamins and minerals your body needs to thrive.

Our new Huel Powder v3.0 includes more vitamins and minerals from natural sources like kombucha (B vitamins), and acerola cherry (vitamin C).

settings.testimonial_comment: "It fueled me perfectly after my conditioning workout but I found myself wanting more because it was so good. "
"I summited Mt St Helens on Thursday. I ate several mini level bars on the way up. Amazing fuel and perfect size.

"Protein bars have been a big part of my life - from pre workout, to post workout, and even mid-game as an athlete.
Finding the right bar that makes you feel good and helps you push through your training is hard.
Finding one that tastes good is even harder. Level somehow figured out how to do it all, and now I’m hooked."
